text: Always remember: you’re unique, just like everyone else.
author: someone

text: Accept who you are. Unless you’re a serial killer
author: Ellen DeGeneres

text: May the Force be with you.
author: Any Jedi

text: In the  middle  of  difficulty  lies  opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
author: Henry Ford

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

text: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be.
author: The Beatles

text: Every little thing is gonna be alright!
author: Bob Marley

text: Error. No keyboard. Press F1 to continue.
author: Just Kidding

text: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.
author: Elon Musk

text: Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
author: Forest Gump

text: Do, or do not. There is no “try”.
author: Yoda
